Key Match Events: Dalano Banton made a buzzer-beating 3-pointer to end the first quarter
Deni Avdija made a buzzer-beating 3-pointer to end the third quarter
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Blazers, who entered the game as the second-worst 3-point shooting team in the NBA, shot a blistering 18 for 32 (56%) from behind the 3-point line
Others: Robert Williams and Jerami Grant each scored 19 points to lead the Portland Trail Blazers
Naz Reid led Minnesota with 28 points
Anthony Edwards pitched in 26 points for Minnesota
